item.title: Neovim: From simple texteditor to IDE like
item.description: Hi, it’s Kn. Neovim comes with cool new improvements like Lua remote plugin host, built-in LSP client (yes!), and Treesitter syntax engine I found there are already a bunch of great plugins that leverage those features. I tried them, and already love them! Also Since my current laptop is quite old ( a Macbook with core i5 gen 7th processor and 8gb ram ), Sublime Text or Vscode is too “hard” for him to handle.
